name: Relic Evolver
description:
You are a relic, lost in the sands of a strange world.

After awakening, you find yourself surrounded by hostile creatures, who are intent on seeing your demise. This is their mistake, destroy your enemies, and use their own power against them - evolve your weapons to match and outwit all of those who stand against you.

Controls:

WASD for movement, and MOUSE for aiming.
LMB = Primary Weapon
RMB = Secondary Weapon
Space = Dash
